title: Lil Nas X’s Sole-Selling Collab Sparks Fires with Nike
description:
From Old Town Road to Hell and back, Lil Nas X’s recent collaboration with MSCHF to convert Nike Air Max 97’s into “Satan Shoes” is sparking outrage and causing confusion. With many threatening to boycott Nike for their alleged Satanism, Nike is suing MSCHF and looking to set the record straight.  Tune in to hear us break it all down!

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/legallyjudgy/?hl=en
Twitter: https://twitter.com/LegallyJudgy
